attributes.label: ascii-inline
attributes.description:
weather or not to replace typical ASCII values
with their ASCII value representation
( ex: 0x61 ==> ".a" )

attributes.label: bytes-per-group
attributes.description: the number of bytes between separators

attributes.label: bytes-per-line
attributes.description: the number of bytes to display per line

attributes.label: bytes-until-forced-line
attributes.description:
currently does nothing
it WOULD force a line break every X bytes

attributes.label: display-ascii
attributes.description: weather or not to display ASCII on the side

attributes.label: edit-type
attributes.description:
the mode of data entry:
insert:
    inserts data between bytes
overwrite:
    overwrites the currently selected byte
readonly:
    no edits are possible

attributes.label: max-lines
attributes.description: the number of lines to display at once

attributes.label: mode
attributes.description:
the mode of operation:
region:
    used to highlight different regions. Hovering over
    a region displays a tooltip
edit:
    regions are displayed in the background, allowing
    the user to edit directly
noregion:
    regions are not displayed at all

attributes.label: region-depth
attributes.description: the number of regions to traverse
